reploid.core.body.description: App root HTML structure (used if not overridden by page_composition)

reploid.core.utils.description: Core utility functions (includes custom Error definitions)

reploid.core.ui.description: Core UI rendering and event handling

reploid.core.toolrunner.description: Tool execution engine (static + dynamic via worker)
